txt.en: 'Such a powerful creature of shadow and flame I have not faced in a very, very long while.'
'But I see by your faces that you have faced him before.'
'Balrogs are not so easily slain, though they may seem so when temporarily defeated.'
'Fortunately, I posses the art required to extinguish this fell foe for good.'
'I little expected to find the likes of you, here. Still, you are welcome for the air here fills me with foreboding.'
